author: josias
msg: Fixed some character encoding problems: don't use OutputStreamWriter because it changes the encoding of the stream. Use getParameter() instead of get() for cocoon's HttpRequest class because it fixes the encoding. Changed the default uri encoding of jetty to ISO-8859-1 so it is equal to tomcats default encoding. fixes bug #36341
